Bayesian Changepoint Detection
==============================

## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/phamquiluan/BOCPD.git
cd BOCPD
pip install -e .

# or
pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/phamquiluan/BOCPD.git
```
